name: closing chapter.
description:
In the calm before the storm, you have one last conversation with your rival. A short visual novel about things to come.

Features:
  • 1.4k+ words
  • 1 Choice
  • 2 Endings
  • 2 CGs
  • Playable in browser*

*For best player experience, downloading the game is recommended!

Credits:

Writing, Art, and Programing: Pumpkin Spike

Music: Alcaknight
